note:
This David C. Russell is an American male, semi-retired, author of short fiction stories and three book titles over the last decade.
- Human Being Human Doing, May 2023, EBook and Print from major vendors; Google title, author, and print or EBook for shopping links.
- Homecoming: A Memoir, 2018, Smashwords.com
- Waiting For Messiah, Anthology - 2017, Smashwords.

David enjoys classical and acoustic music, Scrabble, viewing TV sports, decent movies, and some sitcoms.
Home is lower Michigan.
